snippet: Chelsea extended its Premier League lead to 7 points by winning at Aston Villa, 2-1, on Saturday while Manchester City was held to a 1-1 draw by visiting Hull.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Chelsea defeats Aston Villa, 2-1, while Manchester City is held to 1-1 draw by Hull City; other matches noted.
lead_paragraph: Chelsea extended its Premier League lead to 7 points by winning at Aston Villa, 2-1, on Saturday while Manchester City was held to a 1-1 draw by visiting Hull.

headline.main: Manchester City, Barely Salvaging Tie, Falls Further Behind Chelsea in Title Race
headline.print_headline: Manchester City, Barely Salvaging Tie, Falls Further Behind Chelsea in Title Race
